name: Factory (tufduck)
description:
This is my first completed game, a remake of the old Nintento Game & Watch game Mario Bros. It's made in the Godot 3.1 Engine.

Bob and Amanda are factory workers. Their job is to feed boxes filled with hazardous chemicals onto fast-moving conveyor belts, and to catch the boxes on the other end of the belts. All of this needs to be done under supervision from the mean factory manager. Any mistake in the production line, and he won't hesitate for a second to run out yelling on poor Bob and Amanda. 

You, as the player, control both Bob and Amanda simultaneously. Your objective is to deliver as many boxes as you can, thus getting the highest score possible. The game gets progressively more challenging, as the conveyor belts run faster and faster and the boxes come out more frequently. Every time you fail to catch a box it will crash to the floor and the factory manager's anger meter fills up. When his anger meter reaches the top, it's game over.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Bob

Arrow keys - Amanda
